headline: Bombardier Stock Slides After Trump Threatens Canada With Aircraft Tariffs
summary: Bombardier shares sold off after President Trump threatened to decertify Canadian aircraft, including Bombardier jets, and apply 50% import duties to them. Trump's threat came in retaliation for what he described as Canada's refusal to certify U.

headline: 5 Ways Retirees Can Offset Income When Social Security Falls Short
summary: Social Security was originally designed to be a supplemental form of retirement income. Under the three-legged stool model, retirees ideally live on a combination of employer pensions (or more likely 401(k)s and IRAs), personal savings and Social Security. But many retirees struggle to make ends meet, with some relying solely on Social Security. Whatever your ... 5 Ways Retirees Can Offset Income When Social Security Falls Short

headline: Stocks to Watch Friday: Apple, Chevron, Visa
summary: ? Apple (AAPL): The company posted blowout iPhone sales and quarterly profit, but investors were concerned by rising costs. ↘️ Chevron (CVX): The only U.S. oil major in Venezuela is due to post earnings early Friday, as is Exxon Mobil (XOM), which left the country in 2007.

headline: Trump Threatens to Decertify, Levy Tariff on Canadian Planes
summary: Trump said Canada had “wrongfully, illegally, and steadfastly refused to certify the Gulfstream 500, 600, 700, and 800 Jets,” in a social media post Thursday.  In response, he said the US would decertify “Bombardier Global Expresses, and all Aircraft made in Canada, until such time as Gulfstream, a Great American Company, is fully certified.”

raw.headline: Trump Threatens to Decertify, Levy Tariff on Canadian Planes

In response, he said the US would decertify “Bombardier Global Expresses, and all Aircraft made in Canada, until such time as Gulfstream, a Great American Company, is fully certified.”

headline: General Dynamics Navy Deal Highlights Backlog Strength And Valuation Picture
summary: General Dynamics (NYSE:GD) has secured a nearly US$1b multi year U.S. Navy systems modernization contract. The award comes alongside record growth in the company’s submarine and combat systems segments. The contract follows strong Q4 and full year results with a record backlog across the business. For you as an investor, this contract highlights how central General Dynamics is to U.S. naval and undersea programs, including submarines and advanced combat systems. The company operates across...

headline: Trump Threatens to Ground Canadian Aircraft and Apply Tariffs to Imports
summary: The president says the move is in response to Canada delaying certification of U.S.-made Gulfstream jets.

raw.headline: Trump Threatens to Ground Canadian Aircraft and Apply Tariffs to Imports
raw.summary: The president says the move is in response to Canada delaying certification of U.S.-made Gulfstream jets.

headline: Trump says US decertifying Bombardier Global Express until Canada certifies Gulfstream
summary: WASHINGTON, Jan 29 (Reuters) - President Donald Trump said on Thursday the U. was decertifying Bombardier Global Express business jets and threatened 50% import tariffs on other aircraft made in Canada until the country certified a ​number of planes produced by U.
